title: Daily Market Snapshot
content:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, down -57.18 
        points to 19762.60, a move of  -0.29%. 
        On a point basis, the blue-chip index traded in its narrowest daily range in three years.
        The S&P 500 SPX, edged -10.43 points lower to 2238.83, 
        a move of -0.46%, while the Nasdaq Composite Index COMP, tacked on 
        -0.90%, or -48.97 points, to 5383.12.
